rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: It is not clear if any of these people were actually infected with H5N1; they were not tested at the time when they were ill. But the fact that they [four additional health care workers] became ill after treating this patient [human H5N1 patient] raises the specter of person-to-person spread of the virus—a possibility that flu experts say needs further exploration.
